post:
**100% Cashback On All New Orders**

For a limited time, purchase any item, for any payment term, and receive a 100% credit onto your account. (ie. If you purchase 1 month for $7, you get a $7 account credit, if you purchase 1 year for $70, you get a $70 account credit)

To take advantage of this deal, place an order for any* package you like, for any length of time, between now and 11/27. NO LIMIT on quantity!

Place an order soon, as this offer is extremely limited, and won't come again any time soon!

**_Dedicated Server Example:_**

> - CPU: E3-1230
> - RAM: 8GB DDR3
> - HDD: 1 TB HDD
> - Port: Up to 1Gbps
> - BW: 20 TB
> - IPv4: /30
> - IPv6: /64
> - Price: $60/mo
> - Cashback: $60
> - [Order Now](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=269)

_**VPS Example:**_
> 
> SSD KVM Nano
> - 1 vCore
> - 512 MB RAM
> - 1 IPv4
> - /64 IPv6
> - 1 TB Transfer
> - Monthly: $6/mo ($6 cashback)
> - Annually: $60/yr ($60 cashback)
> - [Order Now](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=208)

Want a different product or configuration? Visit https://www.spryservers.net/ and place an order for any* product and receive this offer.


_*Domain names and SSL certificates are excluded from this offer. You must open a support ticket mentioning this deal, and request the account credit within 7 days of placing your order. Applies to new orders only. Offer void if you cancel a similar configuration within 30 days after or immediately before taking this offer._
